ad13.name: Accelerator D-13
ad13.description: A long out of use accelerator model. However, it can still be quite precious.

accessCard.description: It definitely matches the door leading to the locked room in Ramsey's office.

pistol.name: Pistol
pistol.description: A simple weapon that shoots pure energy.

killVincent.name: Beauty and the Beast
killVincent.description: Kill 'Amnesia' nightclub owner Vincent Ramsey at the request of his girlfriend, Nyx.

zedAccelerator.name: Relic of the Past
zedAccelerator.description: Bring Zed an old model of an accelerator. In return you will receive a gun from him.

prologue.title: Prologue
prologue.subtitle: PARADISE LOST
storyIntro:
Megacity is a place overrun by poverty and feuding gangs, where powerful
	corporations have the most influence. The violence in the streets is a clear sign of
	an impending war. Government operating from behind the secure walls of City Hall are
	trying to combat this, but so far without success. There are rumors that they themselves
	are secretly supporting the chaos to create a New Order on the ruins of the city.
dream: Standing at the edge of the tallest tower...
Falling and falling for what feels like hours...
wakeUp: You wake up dazed from a restless slumber.
It was the same dream again...

You are somewhere in a dark alley. Above your head, among the smoggy haze, as if torn from
	a dream, rise the monumental skyscrapers of large corporations.

Their divine majesty beats
	you to the eyes.

Your heart beats so hard that only the stinging touch of the wind protects you from a sudden
	heart attack.

Suddenly a wave of shivers comes over your body, you start shaking like an
	aspen, and realize that you are lying on a lair made of some old newspapers.
When you rise from the ground, you notice a sea of trash around you.

It's full of cardboard
	boxes, old mechanical parts, and god knows what else.
Maybe you will find something interesting there...
menu1: Search the area for something valuable.
Find the exit from the alley.
findingAccelerator: You start rummaging through the trash.

The search takes a long while, but eventually you
	manage to find something.
Hmm, that might come in handy in the future.
outOfAlley: You're not going to rummage through the trash.

And that's okay, you probably wouldn't find
	anything there anyway.

Instead, you slowly toddle toward the neon color bombs at the end of
	the alley.
You slowly toddle toward the neon color bombs at the end of the alley.

You are getting closer and closer to your goal when from the right, from behind a veil of
	shadows, a low, not very pleasant voice belonging to a man speaks up.
You stop and turn towards the owner of the voice.

His silhouette looms in the darkness. It's
	one of the homeless people who live here. What can he have for you?
You have a mysterious stranger for nothing. You speed up your step and leave him far behind you.
Whatever he wanted from you is no longer important.
menu2: Stop and find out what he wants.
Stop and finally find out what he wants.
menu3: 'I'm just looking around. Where are we actually?'
dialogueWithBob: The shadows in front of you, begin to ripple when your caller stands up.
'Hey, kid. Wait for a second.'
'Hey, you! Come back here!'
'What's your name, boy?'
'So you're
, huh?
All right. I'm
What are you doin' here?'
'You don't want to talk? Okay, fine, but why don't you at least tell me what you're doing here?'
'Ha-ha, that's what I thought. To tell you the truth, you don't look very threatening.

Well,
	you could use some weapon. I happen to know a guy who deals guns. His name is Zed, and his store is
	right around the corner.
Tell him you're coming from old Bob and he'll find something for you.'
'What's wrong with you?
Anyway, it doesn't matter.
Have you ever heard of Megacity?

Well,
	it's right here. The neighborhood we are currently in is called Paradise Lost.

Did I make your
	head clearer?'

'You're wrong. It's absolutely my business, kid. Don't shut your mouth like that, or you might
	lose a few teeth. Got it?'
'Don't show up here again if you don't want to get your teeth kicked in!'

Finally, an old, wrinkled face surrounded by gray fuzz emerges from the darkness. An artificial,
	cybernetic eye watches you vigilantly.
You start to feel strangely uncomfortable.
In an instant the alley is filled with the howling of a police siren.

On the wall in front of
	you, red and blue begin to dance with each other.
'Shit
, cops!
Well, that's super. I think it's time for me to go.'
The aging beggar dives into the embrace of darkness in a flash.

Does this mean you see him for
	the last time?
'All right, that is enough.

I saw the cops hanging around. It stopped being safe here, at
	least for me.
Be glad we don't have more time left.'
Take care, kid.'
paradiseLostMenu: 'Not really. Tell me about this Paradise Lost.'
aboutParadiseLost:
Megacity was built on the ruins of a city destroyed
	by an atomic bomb more than two decades ago.

Nobody remembers its name, but it is known
	that it was one of the most important cities of the old world.

The workers named the district
	Paradise Lost in its memory.
The quasi-people of the downtown will never understand this.
darkAlleyCrossroads: When you enter the alley, you hear a familiar voice.
'It's you again. Why don't you tell me something for this time?'
When you enter an alley, you notice a sea of trash around you.
There is nothing interesting here. Time to go back...
lookAtEden:
You walk out of the alley onto a street lit by neon lights on the opposite side. A large sign
	that reads 'Eden' belongs to a nightclub.

A small crowd gathers outside the entrance to the
	building. Some people are arguing with the bouncers.

Something smells here, it's probably
	trouble...

You walk out of the alley onto a street lit by neon lights and the lamp of a police car on the
	opposite side. A large sign that reads 'Eden' belongs to a nightclub.

Two cops interrogate
	a small crowd outside the entrance to the building.

Something smells here, it's probably trouble
	...
menu4: Come closer and see what it's all about.
Take a look around the area.
encounterGunStore:
You go to the right side of the street. After walking several meters you come across a small
	booth between blocks of flats.
Could it be that the famous gun store managed by old Bob's friend?
downpourStart: You feel single drops hitting you.

It's hard to say if it was going to rain before, but it
	looks like you're gonna get wet.
It only takes a moment for a downpour to fall on the area.
findingNicksHand: You are almost at the exit of the alley when your foot encounters something hard.

You stop and
	lower your gaze to the obstacle.

It turns out to be a bloody hand. Next to it lie handcuffs
	attached to a suitcase.
A small inscription 'Nick Rinaldi' is engraved on it.

It was probably
	the property of some corporate yuppie.
Someone must have made a nice profit at his expense.
hookersMeeting: Somewhere from the side a laugh reaches your ears.

It belongs to two women glued to the wall
	of a neighbouring edifice.
Their skimpy attire immediately betrays their profession

- they
	are a pair of local prostitutes.

One of them finally spots herself and starts waving her hand
	in your direction.
'Hey, sunshine, do you happen to have a cigarette and some fire on you?'

Before you have time to reply, she moves sensuously towards you and her friend tries to keep
	up with her.
prologue.rememberYourName:
Your name... You start wandering your thoughts around what your name is. As if through a fog
	it occurs to you that you are:
